name: Adventurer
description: The character focuses on having adventures.

name: Assassin
description: The character is a hired killer.

name: Criminal
description: The character did something that put them on the wrong side of the law.

name: Engineer
description: The character designs and builds things to solve problems.

name: Entertainer
description: The character entertains others for a living.

name: Health Care Worker
description: The character is a doctor, nurse, therapist or other person dedicated to helping heal others.

name: Investigator
description: The character is trained to solve mysteries.

name: Journalist
description: The character works as a reporter or editor for a news organization.

name: Law Enforcer
description: The character works as a law enforcement officer.

name: Lawyer
description: The character has a law degree and knows how to use it.

name: Leader
description: The character is the leader of a city, region, state or nation.

name: Military
description: The character serves (or at least once served) in a military organization and relies on that training.

name: Outsider
description: The character comes from another planet, dimension or time and is not familiar with how things work on this Earth.

traits.name: Ruler
traits.description: The character is the leader of a city, region, state, or nation.

traits.name: Scientist
traits.description: The character solves problems by means of scientific research.

traits.name: Soldier
traits.description: The character served in a military organization.

traits.name: Spy
traits.description: The character is an expert in espionage.

traits.name: Student
traits.description: The character attends school or college on a full-time basis.

traits.name: Tycoon
traits.description: The character is wildly wealthy and well-known.
